content.rendered:
Emergency Dentist

Emergency Dentist Gardena, CA

We are here for emergency appointments in case you have an unexpected injury or sudden medical need. We are equipped for any dental emergency and offer this as part of our standard care, so do not hesitate to call. Our Gardena emergency dentists are always here to help relieve your pain!

What Are Some Common Dental Emergencies?

Our experienced dental team can quickly treat you if an emergency arises. Emergencies that we see most commonly include

  • Broken or chipped tooth
  • Knocked out tooth
  • Gum abscess, swelling, or bleeding
  • Toothache
  • Lost or broken crown or filling
  • Object stuck in teeth

Preventing Dental Emergencies

Anyone can experience a dental emergency, but there are several precautions you can take to lower your risk:

  • Brushing and flossing twice daily
  • Dental cleaning and checkup twice a year
  • Mouthguard protection for contact sports
  • Cut down on the amount of sugar you consume
  • Avoid crunching hard candy, popcorn kernels, and ice

Many patients will experience a dental emergency at some point in their lives, and our Gardena emergency dentist is always here to help relieve your pain!

Book Your Appointment Now
